publications.title: A CX3CR1 Reporter hESC Line Facilitates Integrative Analysis of In-Vitro-Derived Microglia and Improved Microglia Identity upon Neuron-Glia Co-culture

genomic_modifications.description: Dual reporter insertion of tdTomato linked via T2A to NanoLuciferase targeted to one allele of CX3CR1 in H9 hESCs using CRISPR/Cas9 nickase strategy.

genomic_characterisation.summary: Reporter clones were confirmed by PCR/Southern blot; karyotyping reported absence of chromosomal aberrations.
